Resource.Explain:
On TRON blockchain, everytime you play the game and trigger the smart contract consumes Energy.

-- In general, DiceBet will pay all of the Energy consumption.

-- When the website is visited by too many players at the same time, DiceBet‘s Energy runs out, and players need to use their own Energy.

Rule.title: Rule
Rule.p1: 1. Make sure you have a TronLink wallet. Click to download the TronPay wallet
Rule.p2: 2. To participate in the game you must own TRX, the underlying cryptocurrency that powers the TRON network.
Rule.p3: 3. Set your bet amount, that is, the number of TRX you want to bet on.
Rule.p4: 4. You can adjust the slider to the predicted number range you want. When moving the slider, you can win the total amount, win rate, reward multiple will be automatically adjusted.
Rule.p5: 5. Click the scroll button to start the game. The smart contract will then randomly generate a lucky number from 1 to 100.
Rule.p6: 6. If the lucky number is within your range, you win!
Rule.p7: Still questions? Welcome to join our telegram group, we are glad to help you!

LoginTipTitle: Please log in to your TRON Chrome Wallet.
LoginTipContent:
If you have not downloaded the wallet, please download the Chrome extensions.
TRON Link: https://goo.gl/Yb4NRU
TRON Pay:https://dwz.cn/FyIuFVay

BalanceNotEnough.Title: Insufficient wallet balance
BalanceNotEnough.Content: Please check your betting amount or withdraw the funds in the prize pool to your wallet.

supplement.p1: You will win an extra opportunity to draw for free for each betting over 10 TRX!
supplement.p2: A maximum of 10 opportunities (every day) to draw!

vip.title: VIP Level
vip.remainingBet: A betting of {trx} TRX will make you VIP
vip.copyRight: The award of invitation will be updated at every 00:00 (UTC).
vip.Tip: VIP rewards will be opened. Rewards will be written in the smart contract and it won't be lost.

Invite.previousUrl: TRON blockchain dice game--DiceBet have already launched, betting is mining ,get BET token, get enormous profit divisions. Past but not miss！
Invite.title: Refer a friend
Invite.desc: Refer a friend and get 0.4% of their betting! Copy your exclusive link and send out your invitation!

prizeRule.p1: The referral bonus for each account will be calculated once at 12:00 (GMT+8) every day.
prizeRule.p2: The bonus will be deposited into the corresponding account with a record of the invitation.

PrizeRule.title: 奖励规则
PrizeRule.header: 为回馈支持者，推出每日投注排行榜功能，并对榜单上1-30名的玩家分别给予数额不等的TRX回赠。

content.p4: 每日榜单第4-10名：各自奖励1000TRX
content.p5: 每日榜单第11-30名：各自奖励100TRX

PrizeRule.footer: 奖金将在每日榜单公布后3天内，发放至您的地址。
PrizeRule.footer2: 每日排行结果将于第二天零点公布。
PrizeRule.copyright: * 本活动最终解释权归我们所有

AutoBet.explain:
Automated Betting can bet continuously：

-Enter your betting amount, and click BET

-We will bet for you continuously , one round after another.

-Please join us into the White List of your wallet.

Notice: Betting & Mining automatically will start soon!

ToolTip.NotWithdraw: Due to the price of energy and bandwidth is too high, the withdrawl will be opened later. Rewards will be written in the smart contract and it won't be lost.

Collect.Title: BET Funds Raised (In progess)
Collect.Price: Price of Funds Raised: 1 TRX = 100 BET
Collect.Warning: * The first-time for participating in funds raised should not be less than 100,000 TRX.
